tika-s0305t7:3_1: bahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayo, ajjhattabahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayadhammānupassīti
tika-s0305t7:3_2: nava anupassanā, tathā vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṁ chattiṁsāya ṭhānesu. Dutiye
tika-s0305t7:3_3: dvādasasu ṭhānesūti kāye ajjhattaṁ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā, vedanāya citte dhammesūti
tika-s0305t7:5: 901.Imāya pāḷiyāti imāya hīnattikapāḷiyā. Ime dhammā hīnā lāmakaṭṭhena. Ime dhammā majjhimā hīnapaṇītānaṁ majjhe bhavāti. Uttamaṭṭhena attappakaṭṭhena padhānabhāvaṁ nītāti paṇītā.
tika-s0305t7:7_0: 902-905. Kaṇḍakā etissā atthīti kaṇḍakī, karamandagaccho. Osadhibhāvāpekkhāya itthiliṅganiddeso,
tika-s0305t7:7_1: tabbahulatāya taṁ vanaṁ “kaṇḍakīvana”nteva paññāyittha. Sahassalokanti sahassacakkavāḷalokaṁ.
tika-s0305t7:7_2: Dasacakkavāḷasahassaṁ ekāvajjanassa āpāthaṁ āgacchati tathā ālokavaḍḍhanassa katattā.
tika-s0305t7:12_1: attano abhinīhārānurūpaṁ ñāṇaṁ pavattatīti te kālapadesavasena ceva yathāparicayasattapadesavasena
tika-s0305t7:12_2: ca ṭhānānīti jānanti, sammāsambuddhānaṁ pana anantañāṇatāya sabbattheva appaṭihatameva
tika-s0305t7:12_3: ñāṇanti āha – “sabbaññubuddhānaṁ panā”tiādi. Etaṁ dasabalañāṇaṁ anantavisayattā nippadesaṁ
